hooks.command:
python3 - << 'PY'
import json,sys
req=json.load(sys.stdin)
p=req.get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path','')
ban=['.env','/node_modules/','.git/']
raise SystemExit(2) if any(b in p for b in ban) else None
PY
FILE=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); case "$FILE" in *.md) npx --yes markdownlint-cli2-fix "$FILE" || true ;; esac
